question: Avani Lekhara is associated with which sports?
explanation: Recently, para shooter Avani Lekhara (15) from India shot a junior world record 244.4 in the women’s 10m air rifle standing SH1 event (R2) to won the silver medal at the World Shooting Para Sport World Cup in Al Ain, UAE. Beside this, para shooter Pooja Agarwal shot 228.4 in the final of the women’s 10m air pistol SH1 event (P2)  to won a silver medal at the tournament. Notably, both Indian shooters were making their international debuts at the competition.
